titles.title: Agriculture Marketing Success Act of 2005
AMS Act
AMS Act
To amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act to exempt certain identified varieties of tomatoes from agricultural marketing orders issued by the Secretary of Agriculture.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock and Horticulture.

bill.summary: Agriculture Marketing Success Act of 2005 or the AMS Act - Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act, reenacted with amendments by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to exempt certain tomato varieties produced in Florida under an identity preservation and biotechnology verification program from agricultural marketing order requirements.
